entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pemberton
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
